title: Elon Musk hired a dozen Texas lobbyists this year. State law keeps the extent of their influence under wraps
summary: Elon Musk hired a small army of lobbyists in Texas to push legislation favorable to his companies–namely SpaceX, Tesla, and X Corp–including getting permission to increase rocket launches at SpaceX’s South Texas facility
description: Elon Musk hired a small army of lobbyists in Texas to push legislation favorable to his companies–namely SpaceX, Tesla, and X Corp–including getting permission to increase rocket launches at SpaceX’s South Texas facility
